title: Should You Buy the iPhone 14 or 14 Pro?
description: To the surprise of no one, Apple announced the long-awaited iPhone 14 lineup during its big Sept. 7 event. As expected, we have four new iPhones to look forward to, two “standard iPhones,” and two “Pro” devices. While it’s always hard to pick a new phone, this year it’s particularly tricky. Which iPhone 14 should you…

title: Everything You Need to Know About This Year's Flu Shot
description: It’s flu shot season and, once again, the influenza vaccine is an important one to get. With mask-wearing on the decline, there’s likely to be more of every common respiratory virus around. So you might as well protect yourself against the ones that have safe, effective vaccines readily available.

title: Don’t Upgrade Your AirPods Pro
description: When AirPods Pro were first released in 2019, it was quite a different world. Thanks to their sleek form factor, respectable noise cancellation, and their seamless integration with the Apple ecosystem, they became the go-to pair of earbuds for so many of us. Fast forward to late 2022, and the world of noise-canceling…

title: 6 Ways to Know If You're the Toxic One in a Relationship (and What to Do About It)
description: When you look up “toxic relationship,” all the top results focus on identifying unhealthy or harmful signs in the other person—never you. After all, it’s easy to point fingers and diagnose toxic behaviors in other people. What’s harder is a good long look in the mirror to admit when you’re the one causing problems in…

title: Can You Actually Learn to Play Music From a Video Game?
description:
I’ve been playing music games for the past 10 years and playing music-music for longer than that, and I’m fascinated with how much musicianship you can learn from playing video games. The answer is: Some, and in interesting ways.

Read more.

title: Should I Do High Reps or Low Reps?

description: Let’s say you’ve purchased the perfect vintage shirt at a flea market, or discovered a box of your parents’ or grandparents’ clothing in the attic and found something that actually fits. title: How to Avoid the Abundance of Malware in Minecraft
description: Minecraft is addicting. Minecraft is popular. That combination means there are a lot of us playing the game for hours on end every single day. title: How to Stop Yogurt Splatters Once and for All
description: During my years as a public school teacher in Brooklyn, I would rely on yogurt to hold me over between classes. Yogurt cups are portable, simple, and easy to consume when you barely have time for yourself. There’s just one little problem: yogurt burps.

title: You Can Now Copy Text From Images on Windows
description: Microsoft’s PowerToys has a new utility that lets you copy text from images: If someone sends you a picture of their business card or a screenshot of their bank account details, you can use PowerToys to quickly copy it on Windows. title: Eight of the Best Places to Celebrate Oktoberfest in the US
description: Oktoberfest may be a German tradition, but that doesn’t mean you have to go to Germany to celebrate. In fact, there are plenty of great locations across the U.S. where you can enjoy all the fun of Oktoberfest. Here are eight worth traveling for.
